mauro.io

This is how I made this website

29 november 2013

This website was scaffolded with the wonderful yeoman and generator-jekyllrb.

Under the hood it uses:

  • Jekyll for generating the web pages
  • redcarpet for parsing Markdown
  • Sass and Compass
  • HTML5 Boilerplate
  • jQuery
  • Modernizr
  • Pygments syntax highlighter
  • Robot Slab font for paragraphs
  • Sanchez font for titles

It is hosted on GitHub Pages, thank you for the free hosting, Git rocks!
